title: Plate 4, from "Meister der Innen: Kunst II: Charles Rennie Mackintosh Haus Eines Kunstfreundes (House for an Art Lover)"
description: south elevation of building; green plantlike objects on balcony and along wall at street level; below image \"SUD\" next to metric scale; title upper left; number \"4\" upper right; below image: \"EMIL HOCHDANZ STUTTGART     C.
